# Discord-Guarding

Discord Guarding System

## Installation

Use the package manager [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/) to install discord-guarding.

```css
npm i discord-guard
```

## Usage

```js
const { Guard } = require('discord-guard')
const guard = new Guard('BOT_TOKEN')
guard.start('CHANNEL_ID', 'ROLE_NAME')
```
